name: Polymula 1 version 2
description: An Update to my first version of the game. Several enhancements have been made to the game: A main menu and when you finish your lap you can chose to either quit the game, or do another lap. the game has the standard WASD controls. the game sadly does not have a leaderboard, yet. maybe sometime in the future.  Post your fastest lapTime down in the comments! Any feedback or possibly a fun idea to add to the game? let me know, I may add it! PC support will come soon!
